description: Creates an association between a notification rule and an Chatbot topic or Chatbot client so that the associated target can receive notifications when the events described in the rule are triggered.

parameters.name: Arn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the notification rule for which you want to create the association.

parameters.name: Target
parameters.description: Information about the Chatbot topics or Chatbot clients associated with a notification rule. TargetType (string) --- The target type. Can be an Chatbot topic or Chatbot client. Chatbot topics are specified as SNS. Chatbot clients are specified as AWSChatbotSlack. TargetAddress (string) --- The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Chatbot topic or Chatbot client.

nested_params.name: TargetType
nested_params.description: The target type. Can be an Chatbot topic or Chatbot client.

nested_params.name: TargetAddress
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Chatbot topic or Chatbot client.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the notification rule for which you have created assocations.
